h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Stone Vanguard
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: If you watch him raise both arms to the side in a half-swing motion, he’ll begin to stab the ground repeatedly, alternating his arms four times, before raising both arms high for a ground-bursting blast with both of his arms.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Stone Vanguard' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
If you watch him raise both arms to the side in a half-swing motion, he’ll begin to stab the ground repeatedly, alternating his arms four times, before raising both arms high for a ground-bursting blast with both of his arms.
